title: ActInf OrgStream 007.1 ~ Jamie Joyce, John Ash: Harnessing Collective Intelligence to Map AI Debates
description:
Jamie Joyce & John Ash
"Harnessing Collective Intelligence to Map AI Debates"

The Society Library is a nonprofit organization dedicated to enabling more free and informed decisions by saving users thousands of research hours surfacing collective societal intelligence and modeling data as a deliberation so we can see from different points of view on complex issues. We have worked with Universities, local governments, activist organizations, fact-checkers, and general members of the public to create services, products, and educational content to serve this mission.
Website: http://SocietyLibrary.com

To read more about our AI Debate Maps: 
https://societylibrary.org/topics-blog/ai-alignment-superintelligence-ethics
